enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
section_title: NUMERICAL VALUE FOR FOREST MANAGEMENT UNDER PROTOCOL ARTICLE 3.4 FOR ITALY:
sentences: This issue was presented in SBSTA plenary on 18 May and then addressed in informal consultations.

The item was placed on the agenda at the request of Italy, which sought to reconsider the numerical value for forest management under Protocol Article 3.4(a dditional LULUCF activities), based on country-specific data on forest management.
Parties agreed to this request and adopted conclusions and a draft decision on 25 May .
